name: 3D Game of Life
description:
It's a simple project of game of life in 3D.

It's a zero-player game and all you need to do is place the cubes,then wait for it to change and see.

It is controlled by three simple rules:

1,if there is 8,9or10 cubes around one cube,then the cube survive;

2,if there is 5,6or7 cubes around one cube,then the cube keep its status;

3,otherwise，the cube dies;

Here's some instruction:

WASD/shift/space to move

left click to place the cube

right click to delete the red cube

Q to change the theme

E to run/stop

R to place a cube which will not be influenced by rules

T to restart the game
